verses.verse: Lift up the trumpet, and loud let it ring: Jesus is coming again! Cheer up, ye pilgrims, be joyful and sing; Jesus is coming again!
verses.refrain: Coming again, coming again, Jesus is coming again!
verses.verse: Echo it, hilltops; proclaim it, ye plains: Jesus is coming again! Coming in glory, the Lamb that was slain; Jesus is coming again!
